title: My Dirtiest Macintosh - Macintosh IIvx (But Does it Work?) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: My Dirtiest Macintosh - Macintosh IIvx (But Does it Work?) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: The Macintosh IIvx was Apple's last Macintosh II model, and it was the first Mac with a built-in CD-ROM drive. Krazy Ken recently acquired one, but when he opens it up, things go from bad to worse  Special thanks to Linode for sponsoring this video! Fulfill your cloud computing needs, and sign up now (plus save $20 with my code: COMPCLAN20)    Support the show and get in the credits   Subscribe for more tech videos!   See the Macintosh TV in action   Look at the first Adobe Premiere (1.0)!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures - My Dirtiest Macintosh - Macintosh IIvx (But Does it Work?)  Pledge on Patreon now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's VIP Discord channel!*   Thanks Greg for donating the iFixit kit! Check out Hrutkay Mods here:   Thanks, Steve, for selling me the Multiple Scan display, and for donating so much more! Check out his eBay store here:   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards  #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
